page.title: 09Children's Views Of The Area
page.content:
{Debbie Randall; 7 years and 7 months {} I like living in Parkstone because I'm near the shops and the beach and I live near my nanny who lives in Kimmeridge Avenue. ______________________________________ {Lee Riggs; 8 years and 6 months
I like living in Parkstone because there are lots of shops and my gran lives here and there are lots of beaches. Sometimes I go swimming in the swimming pool. ______________________________________ {Danny Cooper 7 years and 9 months
I would rather be living in Turlin Moor because l like the boats on the sea and l had many frieeds there .
